Each week, Tuesdays will be primarily lecture and class discussion or short activities, and Thursdays will be lab days. You should bring your laptop with you to every class period.

## Week 1 (Jan 19--21): Course Overview

---

__Weekly Overview:__ 

1. Discuss course structure and expectations.
2. Install R and RStudio.
3. Provide a brief introduction to R.
